data.title: Baten Kaitos Soundtracks Soar Onto Streaming Platforms
data.text:


Composer Motoi Sakuraba continues to release stellar soundtracks throughout his career. Besides his work on the Tales of and Star Ocean series, some of his best tracks come from the Baten Kaitos duology. Just in time for the launch of Baten Kaitos I & II HD Remaster, Bandai Namco released the soundtracks for both games on streaming platforms. Some regions allow users to purchase the music through Apple Music and Amazon Music.

Check your streaming platform of choice for each game below:

Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean:

Spotify

Apple Music

Amazon

Baten Kaitos Origins:

Spotify

Apple Music

Amazon

Bandai Namco also launched a YouTube page just for their game soundtracks. More can be gleaned from their new Twitter account and website.

The games are available now for Nintendo Switch. Check out the collectionâ€™s launch trailer below:

What did we think of the original games? Check out our original reviews for the first game and the prequel from back in the day! Stay tuned to RPGFan for more card-based RPGs (hopefully)!
